bill_title: require the Board of Regents to formulate and promulgate a regental policy on outside employment by institutional officers and employees.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the Board of Regents to formulate and promulgate a regental policy on outside employment by institutional officers and employees. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-49 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Not later than October 1, 2010, the Board of Regents shall formulate and promulgate a regental policy specifying and conditioning the extent to which regental officers and employees may accept and retain outside employment, contracts, positions, and appointments, the amount of compensation and other valuable consideration receivable for such outside services, and the extent to which the performance of such outside services may be permitted to infringe upon their primary regental duties. The policy shall clearly delineate that all performance of outside services that are prejudicial to the best interest of the State of South Dakota or the regental institutes or that give rise to the appearance of conflict of interest are unethical and prohibited. Section 2. The Board of Regents shall deliver the policy provided for in section 1 of this Act to the final scheduled meeting for 2010 of the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council and shall seek the advice and consent of the Executive Board to the policy.
